## vision\_v1.Schema$GoogleCloudVisionV1p2beta1WebDetectionWebLabel.languageCode property

The BCP-47 language code for `label`<!-- -->, such as "en-US" or "sr-Latn". For more information, see http://www.unicode.org/reports/tr35/\#Unicode\_locale\_identifier.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
languageCode?: string | null;
```
